import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Modal, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import colors from "../../config/colors"; import "./Modal.css"; function ModalComponent(props) { const [state, setState] = useState(props.searchedUser); console.log("state:", state); return ( Update User Profile
setState((prevState) => { return { ...prevState, emailId: event.target.value }; }) } className="input-field" />
); } export default ModalComponent;
